some of what @Diaian was saying.

I was having trouble with a blank screen whenever i tried to load a saved game. 

A solution i found was to go to the deathspank directory and find a file name "Dallas_swarm"

where your name is instead of Dallas.

1.change the folder name to something else.
2. start up the exe file.
3. yo should see that you cant continue your game
4. close the game, delete the new folder with only the 'vuid' file
5. rename the previous folder you changed the name of back to its original.
6. start up the game again and it should work.

worked for me at least. 

this game is a good laugh.
